conceptual_improvements: Incorporate topological defect density directly into T_μν.
Model the full energy-momentum tensor (T_μν) from nadsoliton field gradients and fluctuations.
Introduce a dynamic coupling factor that depends on scale (r) or information density (ρ).
Consider higher-order curvature terms from non-linear nadsoliton dynamics.
Account for quantum fluctuations of the emergent metric itself.
conclusion: Initial model shows a correlation between information density and Schwarzschild metric, but R² needs significant improvement (>0.8) through more sophisticated modeling of topological defects and the full energy-momentum tensor from nadsoliton dynamics.
